CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy levels of PFDTBT , PFD2TBT , and the ter-polymers were determined to lie in the range from -5.58 to -5.41 eV.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PFDTBT
2. PFD2TBT
3. ter-polymers

These are the names of the materials whose HOMO energy levels were determined in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. PFDTBT
2. PFD2TBT

These are the names of the materials whose HOMO energy levels were determined in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy levels of PFDTBT , PFD2TBT , and the ter-polymers were determined to lie in the range from -5.58 to -5.41 eV.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-Oriented Molecular Orbital) energy levels
2. PFDTBT (Poly(p-phenylene vinylene) Terephthalate)
3. PFD2TBT (Poly(p-phenylene vinylene) Diborote)
4. ter-polymers (a general term for a type of polymer that contains repeating units of two different monomers)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-Oriented Molecular Orbital) energy levels
2. PFDTBT (Poly(p-phenylene vinylene) Terephthalate)
3. PFD2TBT (Poly(p-phenylene vinylene) Diborote)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Hydrogen-Oriented Molecular Orbital) energy levels |
| PFDTBT (Poly(p-phenylene vinylene) Terephthalate) |
| PFD2TBT (Poly(p-phenylene vinylene) Diborote) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy levels of PFDTBT , PFD2TBT , and the ter-polymers were determined to lie in the range from -5.58 to -5.41 eV.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. HOMO energy levels: This is the value of the HOMO energy levels of the three materials mentioned in the paragraph, which is a property of the materials.
2. -5.58 eV: This is the lower end of the range of HOMO energy levels for PFDTBT.
3. -5.41 eV: This is the lower end of the range of HOMO energy levels for PFD2TBT.
4. -5.41 eV: This is the lower end of the range of HOMO energy levels for the ter-polymers.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

HOMO energy levels of PFDTBT, PFD2TBT, and the ter-polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. -5.58 eV: This is the lower end of the range of HOMO energy levels for PFDTBT.
2. -5.41 eV: This is the lower end of the range of HOMO energy levels for PFD2TBT.
3. -5.41 eV: This is the lower end of the range of HOMO energy levels for the ter-polymers.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.58 eV |
| -5.41 eV |
| -5.41 eV |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
